subject: Mid-project checkpoint (state snapshot)
body:
Snapshot for records:
- Project Apollo: active; start_date=2025-08-04
- Managers: Alice (since 2025-08-04), Erin (since 2025-08-11)
- Engineers on Apollo: Bob (Tech Lead since 2025-08-21), Carol (Hardware), Dave (Mechanical), Ivan (DevOps)
- Parts: P-3003 qty=3, P-2002 qty=1, P-4004 qty=4, P-1002 qty=1
- Dependencies: Apolloâ†’Zephyr (Zephyr completed 2025-08-13); Apolloâ†’Hermes (Hermes planned; start 2025-08-14)
- Collaborations: Bobâ†”Ivan (CI pipeline active); Carolâ†”Dave (mounting design v1 active); Bobâ†”Carol (ended 2025-08-21)

This is the current state going into the next phase.

â€” Erin
